text: Stefan de Bod (born 17 November 1996 in Worcester, Western Cape) is a South African cyclist, who currently rides for UCI WorldTeam . Prior to joining in 2019, de Bod had spent three seasons with their development team . In October 2020, he was named in the startlist for the 2020 Vuelta a España. ==Major results== ;2014 : 1st 20px Road race, National Junior Road Championships : National Junior Track Championships ::1st 20px Scratch race ::1st 20px Individual pursuit ;2015 : 1st 15px Team pursuit, African Track Championships : 1st 94.7 Cycle Challenge ;2016 : National Under–23 Road Championships ::1st 20px Road race ::1st 20px Time trial : 2nd Road race, National Road Championships ;2017 : National Under–23 Road Championships ::1st 20px Road race ::1st 20px Time trial : 2nd Road race, National Road Championships ;2018 : National Under–23 Road Championships ::1st 20px Time trial ::5th Road race : 1st Gran Premio Palio del Recioto : 8th Time trial, UCI Road World Under–23 Championships : 8th Piccolo Giro di Lombardia ;2019 : 1st 15px Time trial, African Road Championships : National Road Championships ::2nd Time trial ::3rd Road race : 3rd Overall Tour of Austria ;2020 : National Road Championships ::2nd Time trial ===Grand Tour general classification results timeline=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" |- ! scope="col" | Grand Tour ! scope="col" | 2020 |- style="text-align:center;" ! scope="row" | alt=A pink jersey Giro d'Italia |— |- style="text-align:center;" ! scope="row" | alt=A yellow jersey Tour de France |— |- style="text-align:center;" ! scope="row" | alt=A red jersey Vuelta a España |IP |} {| class="wikitable" |+ Legend |- ! scope="row" | — | Did not compete |- ! scope="row" | DNF | Did not finish |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:South African male cyclists Category:White South African people Category:Competitors at the 2019 African Games Category:Vuelta a España cyclists
